snippet: A new report shows that since 2000, levels of trans fats in Americans' bloodstreams have plummeted nearly 60 percent.
abstract: A new report shows that since 2000, levels of trans fats in Americans' bloodstreams have plummeted nearly 60 percent.
lead_paragraph: The intense battle that public health advocates have waged against trans fats appears to be working: A new report shows that since 2000, levels of trans fats in Americans' bloodstreams have plummeted nearly 60 percent.

headline.main: Blood Levels of Trans Fats Are Declining in Americans
